description:
Hokuto`s lackey gets fed up with Hokuto and decides to leave the group. But Hayashida thinks that`s a mistake, because then what would they call him?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Comment le disciple de Hokuto resta le disciple de Hokuto
You Never Give Me Your Name / Ishii to Gotou no Ballad / I Me Mine / Stranger in Strange Land / Boys & Girls / You Won`t See Me
